The Amazon Search Result Optimizer is a powerful extension that enhances your browsing experience on Amazon.nl and Amazon.de. It helps you focus on the most relevant search results by removing unnecessary distractions, such as items with coupons or lightning deals.

===========================

Update v1.03: 
- Added .es .fr .co.uk and .com, next to .de and .nl

Update v1.02: 
- Now shows price after coupon discount

Update v1.01:
- Added a separate feature to also filter for list views; now you can both search in grid and list.

==========================

Key Features:

Streamlined Search Results: 
The extension filters out listing results that have coupons or lightning deals, ensuring that you see only the most relevant items.

Enhanced Product Discovery:
By eliminating distracting elements, you can quickly find the products that best match your search criteria looking for coupons, and saving you time and effort.

Easy to Use: 
Simply install the extension and let it do the work for you. It seamlessly integrates into your Amazon browsing experience without any complicated settings.

Take control of your Amazon search results and browse with ease using the Amazon Search Result Optimizer. Enjoy a clutter-free shopping experience and find the products you need more efficiently.

Disclaimer: Please note that this extension is a work in progress and may not always work automatically with every search result page. In some cases you may need to manually reload the toggle or use the provided reload button to ensure the desired results are displayed accurately. If there are no results, just browse to the next page. If the page is not in a grid result or a special type of category page, it might not work properly. These will be addressed in future updates.
